sections.general: marketing coordinator professional summary marketing coordinator offering 10 years' experience. capable and focused on delivering high quality service. proactive team player and coaching abilities. excellent attention to details. well organized and self-motivated. focus on process improvement. strong time management skills and ability to work under pressure, meet tight timelines and manage multiple tasks simultaneously. skilled at developing and maintaining effective communication channels with clients, peers and administrative staff.
